description: Germany's chancellor confirms she was targeted by hackers said to be Russian military intelligence.
title: Angela Merkel says she is 'pained' by Russian hacking
title_page: Angela Merkel says she is 'pained' by Russian hacking - BBC News
maintext: "Every day I try to build a better relationship with Russia and on the other hand there is such hard evidence that Russian forces are doing this," Mrs Merkel was quoted as saying by AFP news agency on Wednesday.
